text treble_crochet in 1st st treble_crochet ch4 slip_stitch in 2nd st petal here made slip_stitch over to next st repeat from * 5 more times for a total of 6 petals join with slip_stitch to beginning st round 3 *4 single_crochet up side of petal decrease picot 4sc down other side of petal repeat from * on each petal finish off and weave in ends leaf with green chain 7 single_crochet in 2nd from hook half_double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet and slip_stitch in last chain turn along opposite side abbreviations single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet and slip_stitch in beginning st leave chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet a 4 tail to sew to the back of the flower make as half_double_crochet = half-double_crochet many leaves as desired finish off and weave in double_crochet = double_crochet treble_crochet = triple crochet ends slip_stitch = slip_stitch decrease = single chain 2 together picot = ch3 join to 1st chain with a slip_stitch pattern by jennie claver firefly patterns please do not sell copy or distribute patterns
